# KMD

```{r, fig.width=20, fig.height=15}
library(MetaboCoreUtils)
library(RColorBrewer)

ref <- c(12, 1, 16, 14, 31, 32)
names(ref) <- c("C", "H", "O", "N", "P", "S")

for(clm in c("AMIDE", "CSH", "BEH")){
  for(plr in c("POS", "NEG")){
    if(plr == "NEG"){
      ttl <- "Negative"
    } else if(plr == "POS"){
      ttl <- "Positive"
    }
    
    
    dt <- read.table(
      paste0(pth, "20210505_GRAPE_", clm, "_", plr, "_RT.txt"), 
      sep = "\t", na.strings = "N/A", skip = 3, row.names = 1)
    colnames(dt) <- "RT"
    dt$ID <- rownames(dt)
    dt  <- dt[!is.na(dt$RT),]
    
    dt$ID <- gsub("CER-H2O", "CER", dt$ID)
    dt$ID <- gsub("PC-COO", "PC", dt$ID)
    dt$ID <- gsub("_Na", "", dt$ID)
    
    dt <- merge(dt, cmps, by = "ID")
    dt$mass <- NA
    for(i in seq(nrow(dt))){
      if(grepl("D", dt$formula[i])){
        dt$mass[i] <- getMolecule(dt$formula[i])$exactmass
      } else {
        dt$mass[i] <- MonoisotopicMass(formula = ListFormula(dt$formula[i]))
      }
    }
    
    if(clm == "AMIDE"){
      rt <- 24
      if(plr == "POS"){
        dt <- dt[dt$RT < 20, ]
      }
    } else {
      rt <- 30
    }
    
    dt_clm <- get(paste0("dt_", clm))
    
    
    dt$NM <- NA
    for(i in seq(nrow(dt))){
      myform <- countElements(dt$formula[i])
      pippo <- ref[names(myform)]
      dt$NM[i] <- t(pippo) %*% myform
    }
    dt$KMD_CH2 <- dt$NM - (
      dt$mass * (as.numeric(t(ref[names(countElements("CH2"))]) %*% countElements("CH2")) / 
                   MonoisotopicMass(formula = ListFormula("CH2"))))
    
    dt <- dt[!dt$ID %in% cmps_IS$ID, ]
    dt$ID <- gsub("Lyso_", "L", dt$ID)
    dt$C <- NA
    dt$db <- NA
    idx <- which(dt$class %in% c("FA", "LPA", "LPC", "LPE", "LPG", "LPI", "CER", "MG"))
    dt$C[idx] <- as.numeric(gsub(":.*", "", gsub(".*_", "", dt$ID[idx])))
    dt$db[idx] <- as.numeric(gsub(".*:", "", gsub(".*_", "", dt$ID[idx])))
    idx <- which(dt$class %in% c("PA", "PC", "PE", "PG", "PI", "PS", "DG", "MGDG", "DGDG"))
    dt$C[idx] <- unlist(lapply(strsplit(gsub(
      ")", "", gsub(".*\\(", "", dt$ID[idx])), "/"), function(x) 
        sum(as.numeric(gsub(":.*", "", x)))))
    dt$db[idx] <- unlist(lapply(strsplit(gsub(
      ")", "", gsub(".*\\(", "", dt$ID[idx])), "/"), function(x) 
        sum(as.numeric(gsub(".*:", "", x)))))
    idx <- which(dt$class == "CAR")
    dt$C[idx] <- as.numeric(gsub("C", "", gsub(":.*", "", dt$ID[idx])))
    dt$db[idx] <- as.numeric(gsub(".*:", "", gsub("-.*", "", dt$ID[idx])))
    idx <- which(dt$class == "TG")
    dt$C[idx] <- as.numeric(gsub("TAG", "", gsub(":.*", "", dt$ID[idx])))
    dt$db[idx] <- as.numeric(gsub(".*:", "", gsub("_.*", "", dt$ID[idx])))
    
    par(mfrow = c(ceiling(length(unique(dt$class))/4), 4), mar = c(3, 2, 1, 1))
    for(cl in unique(dt$class)){
      dtx <- dt[dt$class == cl, ]
      dbcols <- colorRampPalette(c("#9E0142", "#FF7F00", "#33A02C", "#3288BD", "#5E4FA2"))(length(unique(dtx$C)))
      names(dbcols) <- unique(dtx$C)
      print(plot(dtx$RT, dtx$KMD_CH2, col = "white", bty = "l", 
                 xlab = "RT", ylab = "KMD(CH2)", main = paste0(clm, " - ", cl)))
      text(dtx$RT, dtx$KMD_CH2, paste0(dtx$C, ":", dtx$db), 
           col = dbcols[as.factor(dtx$C)])
      for(j in seq(length(unique(dtx$C)))){
        dty <- dtx[dtx$C == unique(dtx$C)[j], ]
        if(nrow(dty) > 1){
          abline(lm(dty$KMD_CH2~dty$RT), col = dbcols[as.character(unique(dty$C))])
        }
      }
    }
  }}
```
